reviews.review: One of the best co-op games ever
One of the best portal games
Very GoodGame for story and CO-OP
MUCH longer than the 1st game, an interesting twist on the style but still good old portal.
To be fair, I only bought this game only because of Chell; she's really cute. But this game is fun still- unless you're dumb like me being stuck on a stage, but fun.

What the shit Valve. I have tried nearly every workaround Ive found for over 2 hours. Support thus far has been brainless.
Im new to valves games and wanted to try Portal 2  (yes everything is legit no piracy).
Thats never going to happen.

Game crashes on start. No error codes, no persistent app hangs or windows, no message whatsoever.
Tried verify integrity and turned off in-game overlay
Tried restarting PC.
Tried msconfig-disable all background services-restart to no avail.
Tried compatibility.
Tried run as admin.
Tried big picture mode.
Tried restart and go offline then again back to online workaround.
Tried McAfee real time exception and turned off firewall.
Tried putting -dxlevel 90 in the launch options as well as -safe and -autoconfig
Tried launching from desktop shortcut, steam, and .exe in local files.
Tried moving the game folder (thru steams button) from F to C. It did produce a window with different behavior but still no launch.
Tried launching without MSI afterburner in background (caused constant crash with mudrunner for me dont ask how idk)
Tried sacrificing a lamb to the cult god Gaben.

Nothing has worked.
Steam up to date.
win10 PRO 64bit. Up to date.
ryzen 2600
16GB ram @3000
SSD
GTX1070 Driver is up to date.

RESOLVED!
MSI after burner and or riva tuner statics server were the cause. Even though I tried earlier in the beginning closing the app..
Story took me 8 hours to do but I loved it. cant tell this is a decade old. Man now I understand why so many people give praise to valve. except when it comes to counting.
jo ne geiles spiel kann ich nur weiter empfehlen
真是款好遊戲，與朋友一起玩更好玩了。
игра классная не смотря на то что старая, имеет мультиплеер. Хорошая головоломка от Valve и продолжение 1 части. головоломки не слишком простые и не слишком сложные.
Güzel oyun yoldaşlar indirmenizi tavsiye ederim
If you dont like this game then fuck you
akil ve zeka oyunu Bulmacalar Efsane
Exelente juego, con una historia muy interesante
This game is so amazing. A lot of effort put in.
Do not have enough brain power to play this
Oyun gerçekten çok iyi hikayesi olsun grafikleri olsun kontrolleri olsun tam bir baş yapıt . bölümleri geçmek için zeka gerekiyor o yüzden ben bayaa dır ilerleyemiyorum :)
Отличная игра в жанре головоломок, важную роль сыграл ко-оп так как можно веселится с другом, прикольный сюжет, в общем всем рекомендую.

Im pretty late to the portal party but bought the game so i can experience this gaming classic with the portal 1 and 2 pack and honnestly i recommend it a lot. Its a really funny game with the puzzles done with portals, some rooms are pretty hard but when you figure it out you feel achieved.
il est top mais mieux en multi
Nice story, i finished this game two times and it's still really good.

güzel bir oyun ama uyarım var
eğer yanlız oynicaksan portal 1 i bitirmen lazım yoksa anlamazsın ve saat bakımından hikayeyi bitirip sıkılıcaksın
ama eğer ark varsa (1 tane yeter) mükemmel eğlenceksiniz ve ne kadar çok oynarsınız bilemem

This game is 10 years old and is still better than most games today, i can't believe how good this game looks for its age, the storytelling is amazing, the voice acting is good, the levels are very well made and fun to play, everything about this game is amazing, Valve just CANNOT make a bad game, wish they could make more sequels to games though
A very funny game with interesting mechanics.

jogo simplesmente incrivel com graficos bons e historia super legal
好玩，推荐，游戏性及设定不错，关卡很有创意
it is very good to play with your friend
игра стоит своих денег. весёлая. особенно в коопе, с другом проходили и угарали. так что советую купить, а не скачивать пиратку. т.к. будут доп возможности, которые лучше не стоит упускать

Gra posiada świetną grafikę, muzyke oraz fabułę. Warte do zaznaczenia jest to że zagadki są przyjemne,  takie że nie trzeba rok myśleć żeby je rozwiązać a mimo wszystko po rozwiązaniu dały mi satysfakcje. Jeszcze nei testowałem coopa ale wydaje się być git.

Неплохая игра с не очень сложными головоломками и забавным сюжетом, также присутствует кооп. Хотя бы один раз пройти игру стоит.
güzel oyun ama çok düşünürseniz asla leveli geçemezsiniz. basit düşünüp leveldeki kaynakları değerlendirmeniz gerekiyor.
Игра очень классная, жалко что нету 3 части (
很棒的游戏，关卡紧张有趣脑洞大开，剧情曲折反转，如果你觉得主线剧情没有挑战性的话就去试试创意工坊吧，对了你还可以叫上你的女朋友一起玩哦
I play this game too much... and so will you >:D
Одна из лучших игр, и последняя игра которой Valve нас порадовали.
Очень хорошая и интересная головоломка для друзей и просто для одного человека. Советую.

The Portal Saga is still one of my favorites.
I'd recommend any gamer to give both games a try and go through the single player at least once.
Portal 2 Co-Op mode is also good and I also recommend playing it with a friend for the best experience.

This is great mind game.
Where u have to solve puzzle in a 3D interactive world including portals to travel, reach places and many other interactions to sovle a puzzle.
There is CO-OP 2 persons.
This game is funny with great lighting and sound effects. 10/10
Советую логическая игра и кооп продуман
这是一款十分有意思的游戏，通过自己的思考来通过精心设计的关卡十分有趣，其中的剧情十分耐人寻味，让我不禁地多通关几遍，另外双人联机十分有趣！！推荐与好基友一起游玩！最后如果原有地图不想玩的话，创意工坊有更多有趣的地图等待你发现！！！
Now just waiting for Portal 3. I love Wheatly and the companion cube. The multiplayer levels are pretty fun too.
